title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
description:
When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 
1) HTML text within <html> tags
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
3) Text with RTF tags

The dynamic text content type does not have any effect on how the content is displayed.
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the content according to the specified content type.
EB: The dynamic text element should display the content with HTML tags rendered as HTML, HTML fragments preserved as is, and text with RTF tags converted to the corresponding formatting.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Prepare a database with a field that contains the three types of content (HTML text within <html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags).
2. Create a dynamic text element to display the content of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text element does not render the content correctly based on the specified content type.
